column12: hungry little boys. Their eyes sparkled with delight when they saw the nice brown turkey
column13: and the pies and cakes. They were soon seated at the table; and papa and mamma waited on them.It made us all glad to see how the poor fellows enjoyed their dinner. One ragged little boy was so afraid of soiling the cloth
column14: that he quietly slipped the bones under the table. Another boy saw him
